reset

void reset()
Resets the names and textures of all items to the notchian defaults. Use with care.

registerCustomItemName

int registerCustomItemName(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin,
                           String key)
Registers the id for a custom item. The key should be unique. The returned id should be used for accessing the item and is persistent between server restarts and reloads

Parameters:
key - Key of the new item
Returns:
the unique id or null on error

removeBlockOverride

boolean removeBlockOverride(org.bukkit.block.Block block)
Removes the custom block override from this block

Parameters:
block - to remove the override
Returns:
true if successful

overrideBlock

boolean overrideBlock(org.bukkit.block.Block block,
                      CustomBlock customBlock)
Overrides the block to be the customBlock This can be used to set custom blocks at the location.

Parameters:
block - the block to override
customBlock - the custom block to use instead of the block

overrideBlock

boolean overrideBlock(org.bukkit.World world,
                      int x,
                      int y,
                      int z,
                      CustomBlock customBlock)
Overrides the block at x y z to be the customBlock This can be used to set custom blocks at the location.

Parameters:
world - the location is in
x - location
y - location
z - location
customBlock - the custom block to use at the location

registerSpoutRecipe

boolean registerSpoutRecipe(org.bukkit.inventory.Recipe recipe)
Registers a SpoutRecipe to the server

Parameters:
recipe - to register
Returns:
true if successful
